Introduction

EVERGLOW (stylized as ΣVΣRGLOW) is a 6-member girl group from Yuehua Entertainment. The lineup consists of Sihyeon, E:U, Yiren, Mia, Aisha, and Onda. The members are notable for appearing and competing on various survival shows namely Idol School, MNET's survival programs Produce 101 and Produce 48.

The group name can be translated to “Always glowing” and thus reflects on the group’s strong will, energy, and potential as an upcoming group. The fandom name can be split up into two parts being For and Ever, or "For Everglow", meaning the fans are devoted to the members and forever, meaning to become one with Everglow and to be together forever.

On March 18, 2019, Everglow made their official debut with the song "Bon Bon Chocolat" through the digital single album "Arrival of Everglow".

On September 24th, 2019, Everglow received their first music show win with "Adios" on The Show.

Following the release of the group's third single album, Last Melody, the role of leader, initially held by E:U, was officially transferred to Sihyeon.
